query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN accountStatus ENUM('active', 'inactive', 'suspended', 'trial') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'trial' AFTER useRealData,
ADD COLUMN subscriptionTier ENUM('free', 'basic', 'pro', 'enterprise') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'free' AFTER accountStatus,
ADD COLUMN billingCycle ENUM('monthly', 'yearly', 'none') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'none' AFTER subscriptionTier,
ADD COLUMN nextBillingDate TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER billingCycle,
ADD COLUMN accountActivatedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER nextBillingDate,
ADD COLUMN accountDeactivatedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER accountActivatedAt,
ADD COLUMN trialEndsAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER accountDeactivatedAt;
